column4: can you clarify this for me....new to linux >I finally figured out how to compile and install that pan beta 0.119 newsreader(supports nzb files). I now have a package installer in the folder. I notice the tar.gz file is only about 1.9 mb, while the folder I extracted it to, and I guess contains the files used to compile is now 114 mb (why so large?). If i want to use the package installer on another machine do I need to keep the whole folder containin
I generally stay away from compilations, except for my kernel that is
this was the only way to get the app i wanted as it was beta
you'll start dreaming about penguins soon, dont you worry
